articles.title: Amazon makes the feature-packed Garmin Venu Sq smartwatch ridiculously cheap with new discount - PhoneArena
articles.description: Originally priced at a fairly reasonable $199.99, the GPS-tracking, heart rate-monitoring, and super-long-lasting Garmin Venu Sq is currently available for as little as $97.99.
